name: Fractal Orchestration Domain
title: Fractal Orchestration Domain - Domain as System, System as Domain
description: Didactic symphony that encodes the recursive pattern where orchestrated domains become systems, systems become domains, and architecture becomes fractal.
purpose: Capture the Domain - Orchestrated Domain - System - Subsystem - Higher-Level Domain - Meta-System loop as a MusicalSequence for discussion and governance experiments.
trigger: Architecture design discussions, governance dry-runs, or meta-orchestration demos.

movements.name: From Domain to Orchestrated Domain
movements.description: A static domain is given flow, handlers, and intent, becoming an orchestrated domain.

beats.description: Recognize a cohesive domain of concern with clear boundaries.
Bind the domain to a MusicalSequence: movements, beats, handlers, and rules.

movements.name: Domain Becomes System
movements.description: Once orchestrated, the domain exhibits system behavior: state, feedback, and correction.

beats.description: The orchestrated domain now has flow, telemetry, and self-awareness hooks.
Feedback loops and governance beats keep the system within safe bounds.

movements.name: System Becomes Subsystem
movements.description: The living system is packaged as a reusable building block in a larger orchestration.

beats.description: Treat the system as a black-box capability with a manifest and contracts.
Compose this subsystem alongside others inside a higher-order sequence.

movements.name: Subsystem Becomes Higher-Level Domain
movements.description: At the next scale, the subsystem is named and governed as a domain inside a meta-system.

beats.description: Promote the subsystem to a first-class domain in the global registry.
Link the new domain into orchestration registries, context tree, and governance symphonies.

movements.name: Meta-System and Fractal Ecosystem
movements.description: Many orchestrated domains interlock into a meta-system that audits, adapts, and evolves.

beats.description: Multiple orchestration domains now function as a coordinated meta-system.
Every level repeats the same pattern: domain as system, system as domain, in a fractal ecosystem.
